name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set in **C++**, **software design**, and **database internals**, which are essential for executing complex query strategies and optimizing transactional and analytical workloads. My strong foundation in **data structures** and **algorithms** allows me to design efficient software solutions, while my expertise in **cloud-native** applications spans multiple platforms including **AWS**, **Google Cloud**, and **Microsoft Azure**.

I have successfully led the development of high-performance applications, integrating modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience includes developing enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors and ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I also have a deep understanding of **MongoDB Atlas** and strong familiarity with cloud architectures.

In addition to my technical expertise, I thrive in collaborative environments, offering mentoring and coaching to junior developers. My knowledge of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation further empowers my ability to build robust, secure applications.
